name: sunnyside vest
notes:
description: the sunnyside vest is a stylish and versatile crochet pattern that is perfect for intermediate level crocheters. the vest features adorable motifs along the back and has a flattering v-neckline with a 2 button closure. itâ€™s the perfect addition to any wardrobe!

[this pattern is free on my blog!][1]

[this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand!][2] the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make the vest plus a free copy of the printable pdf digital download. you can even customize your yarn color!

[a video tutorial is available on my youtube channel.][3]
